name: Othello EndingTraining
description:
This is an application to train othello's final stage power.
This application support from beginners to advanced users.

【5 major features】
· can look at the evaluation value
· 10000 questions + daily questions
· 6 difficulty level
· Options such as favorites
· Friendly design

*attention
・Draw is "Black Win" in thisApp
・Daily question is updated at 00:00
・If you pass, you have to tap the board anywhere

[About edax]
edax is the strongest program developed by Richard Delorme.
https://github.com/abulmo
This application uses the version 4.3 code changed.
The source code (GPL License): https://drive.google.com/open?id=1v_kngI8t4QTu7V3LoIVPUpL1DPcAZFEa
